name: Cute Dolls Surprise Eggs
description:
Do you like to collect surprise toys? Maybe you like to open chocolate eggs in surprise eggs games? If you say "yes"...
Welcome to the world of cute surprise dolls! Lol! In the surprise ball are hidden cute little dolls, fancy colorful and shiny dresses, hairstyles,
accessories, pets, squishy toys and a lot of interesting things! Can you collect them all? In the game you can not only open the eggs with dolls,
but also play a mini-game with puzzles etc. Play in mini-games and do not forget to laugh and scream "lol!" Want to know what is hidden inside the egg?
When you find out what kind of surprise is inside!
This toy dolls simulator would gift you a best friend, you can find many dolls in this eggs simulator opening the game
